summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality, robustness, and configurability of a wav2vec2-based speech model, covering initialization, forward signatures, batched inference, CTC loss handling, training routines, adapter integration, masking strategies, token embedding resizing, gradient propagation, and downstream tasks such as sequence classification and x‑vector extraction.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and performance of speech recognition models in production environments by automatically detecting regressions and confirming that new features or configurations do not break existing behavior.
